chapter.description: A HYDRA colocou sua mira no Simon William e os experimentos com ISO-8 da companhia dele. A S.H.I.E.L.D. não deve apenas proteger Nova Iorque de virar um campo de batalha, mas também impedir o Wonder Man de ser trazido de volta aos ranques da HYDRA.
A.I.M. is trying to develop their own super-soldier, and for the first time it looks like they might actually have something that works. Pepper Potts to the Rescue.
Ultron has escaped his cyberspace captivity and begun building an army! This is a threat on a level we've never seen. All S.H.I.E.L.D. Agents, engage full containment procedures!
S.H.I.E.L.D. is playing a dangerous game of hot potato, as Earth becomes a hotbed of cosmic conflict between some of the biggest powers in the galaxy.

S.H.I.E.L.D. finds itself confronted with byzantine machinations and the disappearance of the newest generation of heroes. Led on a wild chase, they must confront the dark question - if S.H.I.E.L.D. can't keep young heroes safe what else may have fallen through the cracks?

Maximus the Mad reaches out to the Inhuman Royal Family and S.H.I.E.L.D. with troubling news – Thanos has broken free of his amber prison, and is returning to Earth, seeking revenge. A new army of Test Subjects appears as the first wave of the assault, but something about this attack feels off. How can S.H.I.E.L.D. be sure it’s not just a mad scheme?
DO NOT DISPLAY

With enemies appearing around the globe, it is getting harder for S.H.I.E.L.D. to stay on top of the threats. Moving between London, San Francisco and New York has kept S.H.I.E.L.D. busy, but with news of conflict in Wakanda, will their forces finally be spread too thin?
Loki is using Iso-8 to seize the minds and souls of the people of New York. Asgard has sent S.H.I.E.L.D. some backup in the form of one of their greatest warriors: Valkyrie.
Training with Shanna

Asgard's most dangerous foes are on the warpath in Midgard. Thor has mysteriously disappeared, leaving a void amongst the Avengers that must be filled. Many have asked, "Who is worthy of such a great challenge?" Beta Ray Bill has arrived to push back these ancient forces and help discover what end his Oath-Brother has met.

Alternate versions of Spider-Man from multiple dimensions are gathering on Earth, looking for strength in numbers while staying one step ahead of their pursuers - a family of Spider-eating Inheritors. As the Spiders flee from the Inheritors, they find themselves up against the Sinister Six, who are wielding a powerful, Spider-fueled machine capable of altering the universe. Faced with becoming food or fuel, Superior Spider-Man and Ultimate Spider-Man join the fight!

Former enemies and rivals begin to band together as New York's villains realize the potential of Iso-8. And the more you learn about who's really pulling the strings, the more all signs point to Latveria...

Dr. Doom makes his move, driving New York into chaos by leading a massive jailbreak at Ryker's Island. Among the newly liberated are the Fantastic Four's old enemies, the U-Foes. Magneto also makes another appearance, beginning to hint at what his greater plans might be...

Renegade Asgardians are on the move again, with Loki pulling their strings. He seems to be working in concert with HYDRA... and assisting them as they create a new breed of Iso-8-powered villain. At the same time, strange and dire magics are brewing in the secret corners of the city.

Mutants are starting to march. They want rights, and they want Iso-8. Opposition mobilizes, and New York becomes a powder keg... exactly what Magneto wants. Meanwhile, the Maggia and the Hand cooperate on a ritual that may open dangerous doors.

Everything is starting to happen at once. Mutants are marching, the Hand's magical rituals continue, and the Maggia are out to decapitate S.H.I.E.L.D. Loki's also still out there, and HYDRA seems to be expecting a shipment of some dangerous cargo.
S.H.I.E.L.D. is caught in the middle of ongoing riots between mutants and anti-mutant zealots...including some in Congress. At the same time, HYDRA and the Hand enter into an alliance...but why?
Hints of a broader alliance among traditional enemies emerge: the Hand, HYDRA, and A.I.M. are all using the dark portals first opened by the Hood. Who's in charge, and what is the Syndicate?
The deep breath before the plunge, the world will never be the same as new forces are revealed and old ones changed for good.

Recent operations in Wakanda have solidified HYDRA's spot as our primary target, and now there are whispers of a mysterious HYDRA super-soldier. It is time to take the fight to HYDRA, with Captain America and Falcon!
Portals to the infernal realms have unleashed demons onto the streets of San Francisco! S.H.I.E.L.D will have to fight fire with fire... by summoning a few hellspawn of our own.

Vampire attacks are on the rise in London, and there are whispers of the return of the Dark Lord Dracula. Evil walks the streets, spreading terror and fear, yet there is also something...sorcerous in the air. An evil plot is brewing in the Dark Dimension, threatening to bubble over to more than just London. Spitfire races into action, joining S.H.I.E.L.D. in the fight against vampires, while Dr. Strange rescues an old rival, to aid in their search for three shadowy spell-casters.
basic challenge events

A gang war erupts in Hell’s Kitchen after Boomerang picks a fight with the Shocker, sending a message from the Owl. Receiving this message loud and clear, Kingpin takes to the streets to settle this dispute personally, further escalating the danger. Jessica Jones leads a S.H.I.E.L.D. response team to get the streets back under control.
Shortly after the Pulse, Mockingbird was dispatched by Nick Fury to investigate some mysterious energy readings. She hasn't come back.
The Hellfire Club is making trouble in Manhattan, and the White Queen is leading them. So why is Emma Frost asking for help?

Inspired by the upcoming Marvel Comics Event! The newest and most mysterious Inhuman is known only as the Profiler, with the ability to predict the future. Can you choose the right side in this fraternal rift? Civil War makes for strange bedfellows, can one side be right or wrong? Is there more to this mysterious Profiler than meets the eye? One thing is for certain, S.H.I.E.L.D. will never be the same again.
chapter.dispName: Marvel: Avengers Alliance - Civil War II

chapter.description: A mysterious Pulse has slammed into the Earth, wreaking havoc worldwide. As a new S.H.I.E.L.D. recruit, you must prove yourself far earlier than intended, restoring order to a New York under siege by opportunistic criminals of every stripe.

The Phoenix Force, a cosmic entity of death and rebirth, has returned to Earth. It's a power some would fight for, and it threatens to tear the alliance apart. The X-Men would use this force for good, believing that the power can be harnessed to ensure the survival of the mutant race. The Avengers believe it's too dangerous to control, and will only bring destruction. With the future of mankind and mutant-kind alike hanging in the balance, who's side will you choose?

Incursions are increasing in number and severity. Many Villains are starting to come up with their own plans to 'Save The World'. The Serpent's power is increasing while there are rumors in the East that someone has found a way to survive an Incursion, should one destroy our world. S.H.I.E.L.D. begins to expand their operations in Wakanda, and into Madripoor.

The discovery of a few dead symbiotes was only the beginning: Carnage, Venom, Scream, Hybrid and Anti-Venom have arrived on the scene. Along with the mysterious appearance of a new batch of Test Subjects, Spider-Man and S.H.I.E.L.D. look for help in the most unlikely places.

Under the careful watch and guidance of Agent Coulson, Maria Hill, and Hawkeye, the Runaways embark on an undercover operation in the criminal underworld, searching for answers to the coded message left behind by the missing Director Fury.

HYDRA's shipment has arrived, and it is more deadly than anyone could have expected. The Syndicate becomes a reality, and the denizens of the Dark Dimension threaten our world. The circle of chaos expands as more enemy forces learn to control Iso-8.

Magneto declares a grand plan for New York, and civil war erupts between Homo superior and HYDRA. But the Syndicate will have something to say about this, and HYDRA has yet to unwrap its mysterious shipment...

All-out war erupts among Syndicate members vying for control of Iso-8, and Syndicate wannabes looking to prove themselves. It's a battle royale and New York is the battlefield. S.H.I.E.L.D. is all that stands between eight million New Yorkers and utter devastation.
Both the Brotherhood and the Maggia are missing leaders, and HYDRA is trying to fill the void. Meanwhile, someone is continuing to murder low-level villains. But for what purpose?

The Serpent has risen. After feeding upon the fear and terror that continues to spread unchecked, a fully-powered Cul Borson now walks the Earth, threatening its very existence. Having eliminated the minor threats, the Serpent and the Worthy have turned their focus to S.H.I.E.L.D. With pleas to Asgard going unanswered, Midgard must fend for itself or succumb to the Serpent.

While hijacking one of Yondu’s Ravager ships with the assistance of Cosmo and Phyla-Vell, Adam Warlock is able to break through Odin’s barrier and arrive on Earth. However, Adam is lost in the resulting crash landing, only to resurface as Magus his evil alter ego. In this worse case scenario can S.H.I.E.L.D. eliminate Magus while saving Adam as the Serpent threatens to tear apart the world as we know it?
The Circle of Eight are advancing, and there is a disturbance in the demonic realms. The unstable pyres of dark magicks and questionable science are being fueled by greed and the lust for power.
Test Subjects evolving, Sugar Man lurking, and looming over it all, the shadow of Mr. Sinister. Time to brace ourselves for the inevitable Apocalypse.

The effects of Iso-8 exposure begin to make everyday villains capable of taking on Earth's mightiest heroes. As S.H.I.E.L.D. tries to uncover why seeming rivals are coordinating their efforts, you'll need to continue developing your leadership skills and combat abilities.

The Dark Elves are invading London, with portals opening throughout the city. Without the Bifrost, options are limited, but unless we can find a way to take the fight to Svartalfheim, we will fall. In our darkest hour, we turn to Thor.
Gain extra XP with Blaster
Gain extra XP with Tactician
Gain extra XP with Bruiser
Gain extra XP with Scrapper
Gain extra XP with Infiltrator
Gain extra XP with Generalist

A weakened Brotherhood of Mutants cannot stand against a powerful Sentinel army and the prying grasp of Mr. Sinister. With few options left, the remaining members must flee or forge new alliances as they face the breaking of the Brotherhood!

The Worthy are spreading fear and chaos around the world, while Incursion portals begin to be appear at an alarming rate. Some people are calling this the end times. S.H.I.E.L.D. is calling this just another day at work.

Family and friends are always in danger when Hulks are involved. But will S.H.I.E.L.D. be able to keep playing follow the leader while contending with gamma fueled family feuds and mind control? One thing is for sure, S.H.I.E.L.D. has its work cut out for it.

On the Eve of a rare Solar eclipse, a terrifying alliance between Demons and Vampires threatens to tear the world asunder. Splitting their forces and enlisting the aid of Blade, the Vampire hunter, can S.H.I.E.L.D. combat the forces of darkness and restore order or will this night become permanent?

S.H.I.E.L.D. and their allies have never failed to keep Earth safe, but the sudden arrival of Mantis, Moondragon, and the artifact known as the Black Vortex, may finally tip the scales. The Black Vortex promises untold power to any who look into its depths. Cosmic power and clandestine antagonists promise a fierce fight between the forces of Earth and those from beyond.
Daily Mission events

A massive industrial accident has caused the World Security Council to consider overruling S.H.I.E.L.D.'s defense mandate. Put simply: they're trying to push us out, and they're using teams of villains to do it. Crazy? Yes. Effective? Not if we have anything to say about it.

Dr. Henry "Hank" Pym has been brought in to help S.H.I.E.L.D. capture a rogue artificial intelligence created by the Pulse. This is an asset that S.H.I.E.L.D. needs to control before it falls into the hands of A.I.M. or worse!

With S.H.I.E.L.D.'s resources stretched thin, and the circle of 8 activities shifting into overdrive, heroes begin taking it upon themselves to mete out justice. With a mounting body count what could their motivations be? Meanwhile Wakanda is reeling as the White Gorillas gain strength thanks to the continued backing of HYDRA.

A sudden rise in global terrorist attacks by U.L.T.I.M.A.T.U.M. has been effective at keeping S.H.I.E.L.D. busy...perhaps a little too busy. What started as a series of seemingly random attacks now feels like a systematic exploration of S.H.I.E.L.D.'s responses, like pawns testing an opponent's defenses. It's time for the Avengers to assemble, as a familiar foe makes his calculated rise to power, threatening the world.
Challenge to unlock Moondragon

Home to untold wonders, S.H.I.E.L.D. must move quickly to help protect the Savage Land from the predations of scientists gone mad, internal power struggles, and the threat of Iso-8. Defining the age old adage of evolve or die, the High Evolutionary has made the Savage Land his personal playground.

A raid on Hank Pym's research facility threatens to unleash unproven technology on the streets of San Francisco. With his personal research and pride on the line, Hank will not want assistance with containing the breach, but he's going to need it, as Whiplash and Yellowjacket arrive on the scene. Thankfully, a little help comes from the inside, as one of the thieves in the facility rises to the challenge, becoming the Ant-Man.
villain archive events
The old lines of loyalty between A.I.M. and HYDRA are eroding. Ancient Demonic forces begin sensing that the time has come to exploit the opportunity that the chaos has created.

The chaos of the pulse has weakened the boundaries of reality. The very souls of the citizens of New York City are at stake as portals to Hell and the Dark Dimension are opened. It is time to bring in an expert.

Several new extra-dimensional Spiders have arrived just in time to help stop the spread of a powerful new drug, which gives users Spider-Totem like powers. Even with the additional Spider power offered by these new allies, the Spider-Army will be in a fight for survival, as a familiar enemy is chased from the shadows, and a new Spider hungry Inheritor reveals himself.

The effects of the Pulse are not confined to New York City, and neither is S.H.I.E.L.D. We are headed to London to assist Excalibur. Agent Coulson and Professor Xavier are coming along to keep things diplomatic.

There has been a lot of chatter about the Circle of Eight, but nothing solid. Now we are getting reports they are attacking targets in New York and San Francisco. We need to get in there fast, and figure out who these people are.

Following the destruction of the Black Vortex (Spec Op 35), Odin has sealed Midgard with a barrier, preventing unwanted visitors from arriving and leaving. While Odin's motives remain a mystery, S.H.I.E.L.D. is not willing to test the All-Father's barrier, fearful of possible repercussions. The same cannot be said for everyone though, as many powerful foes, now trapped on a dangerous world filled with Incursions and the Worthy, go to great lengths to make their escape.

The Living Pharaoh is working with the Hellfire Club to gather cosmic energy to fuel his destructive powers. Havok has entered the field to assist. His involvement could be exactly what S.H.I.E.L.D. needs... or exactly what the Pharaoh needs to complete his transformation into the Living Monolith!

Arcade has used powerful nanotech to turn half of New York into his own private playground... and we're his toys. He's arranged a game of heroes versus former villains, with the Agent invited to be Player One.

From deepest space, Thanos the Mad Titan has returned, and he has brought with him the fiercest warriors in the galaxy: The Black Order. As always, his goal is death, but a darker motive underlies it. Why is Thanos here? And why is he after Black Bolt, King of the Inhumans?
